mapper.insert: INSERT INTO px_modification (user_id, name, mass_diff, residue, position) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{massDiff}, #{residue}, #{position})
mapper.select:
SELECT c.class, m.id, m.name, m.mass_diff, m.residue, m.position FROM px_modification m JOIN px_classification c ON c.id = m.class WHERE m.user_id = 0
AND (position = 'ANYWHERE' OR (position = 'ANY_N_TERM' AND residue = 'N-term') OR (position = 'ANY_C_TERM' AND residue = 'C-term'))
AND position = 'ANYWHERE'
AND m.class IN (2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 13, 14)
AND m.class IN (2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 11, 13, 14)
AND m.id NOT IN ( SELECT mod_id FROM px_user_modification WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND engine = #{engine} )
ORDER BY
c.${sortBy} m.${sortBy}
;
